comments.author: Etranger
comments.body: Quote from: hd49728 on May 09, 2023, 11:02:49 AMQuote from: daisyfrank on May 09, 2023, 09:14:30 AMbenefits of investing in Bitcoin tradingInvest and trading are different. Invest in Bitcoin trading, what is your implication?I agree, investing and trading are totally different activities and strategies. OP used a completely incorrect formulation, in my opinion. Investing in bitcoin suggests buying bitcoin with the goal of long-term preservation of the value of the asset, as well as with the hope that its price will increase in the future. Bitcoin trading, on the other hand, means buying and selling bitcoin in order to profit from short-term changes in its price. Traders usually make a large number of trades to increase their profits, unlike investors, who can make only a few purchases and sales for the entire time, the time interval between which can reach several years.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: I wondered how to invest in bitcoin trading because investing and trading are different. Investing in bitcoins is buying bitcoins and holding those bitcoins for the short, medium or long term.While trading bitcoins is buying and selling bitcoins for profit. But both of them can make money. The difference is that if in investing, you have to hold it for a while, while in trading, you can make a profit for the day.But it is not easy to profit from trading because you need to learn a lot about trading. This includes knowing when you can trade from the results of the analysis you did.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: One of the primary methods of making money with Bitcoin is through trading. While there is also the option of earning by holding onto your Bitcoin, this is still considered a form of trading. However, it's important to note that making money through Bitcoin trading is not as easy as some might think. It's not a simple task that guarantees quick and effortless profits. If it were, everyone would be a millionaire by now. There are significant risks involved, including the potential for losing money.For instance, if you accumulate Bitcoin and the price subsequently starts to decline, you may need to wait patiently for the price to rise again in order to turn a profit. It requires resilience and patience to make money from Bitcoin trading.
